message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I know it would be very valuable for you.  I'm thinking of a price around $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  How about we split the difference and settle at $10,250?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $9,800. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $9,800 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $10,000 even.  I think that's a fair price and this product will really benefit you.
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I'm willing to go down to $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
